issue.title: [C++] replace_with_mask support missing for list/fixed_size_list/large_list/struct
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13951](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13951). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The replace_with_mask kernel should work for any value type.  However, support is currently missing for:

 - list
 - fixed_size_list
 - large_list
 - struct
